examples.jmdp

Class ProbsExample

  • java.lang.Object
    • jmarkov.jmdp.MDP<S,A>
      • jmarkov.jmdp.InfiniteMDP<S,A>
        • jmarkov.jmdp.DTMDP<InvLevel,Order>
          • examples.jmdp.ProbsExample

  • public class ProbsExample
extends DTMDP<InvLevel,Order>
    Basic example to show convergence of probabilities with probability solver.
    Author:
    German Riano. Universidad de los Andes. (C) 2006
